mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BasicInfoBooks (Number, CategoryNumber, Name, Author, Translator, Press, Price, PublicationTime) VALUES (#{number}, #{categoryNumber}, #{name},#{author}, #{translator}, #{press}, #{price}, #{publicationTime})
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Books WHERE Books.BasicNumber = BasicInfoBooks.Number) as Total, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Books WHERE Books.BasicNumber = BasicInfoBooks.Number AND State = True) as Borrowed FROM BasicInfoBooks WHERE Id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM BasicInfoBooks WHERE Number = #{number}
AND Id != #{id}

SELECT * FROM BasicInfoBooks
AND Name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
AND Number LIKE "%"#{number}"%"
AND CategoryNumber LIKE "%"#{categoryNumber}"%"
LIMIT #{start}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BasicInfoBooks
AND Name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
AND Number LIKE "%"#{number}"%"
AND CategoryNumber LIKE "%"#{categoryNumber}"%"
